column2: BRIEF-Acadia Realty Trust Q1 FFO Per Share $0.33 Acadia Realty Trust: * REAFFIRMS 2018 ANNUAL EARNINGS PER SHARE WILL RANGE FROM $0.37 TO $0.48 AND 2018 FFO PER SHARE WILL RANGE FROM $1.33 TO $1.45 * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.38 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
